name: Heli Heroes
description: HELI HEROES updates the old-school "shoot'em up" arcade machine games to new dimensions on today's PCs. You command an AH-64 Apache Longbow or a Russian Hokum helicopter. The goal is to fly through various levels and carry out the mission objectives.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel or AMD Single Core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with TnL support and 32 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel or AMD Single Core CPU 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with TnL support and 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

reviews.review_text: Wow...what a sad game. I was thinking it would be something different. The controls from the keyboard are awkward and awful. The voice acting was equally terrible. Not even unique at all!! I would NOT recommend this game at all!!!
i cant tell you if its good or not its not even working
Got this from ♥♥♥ random keys. Tried giving it a chance but this game is so repeatitve.
I'm Japanese capable of speaking English, but the menu was in some weired language, and I couldn't get to the menu to change the language since it was way to weired language.

I wanted to give the game a chance since I really like top down shooters. It seemed to be in the style of old classics like 'Desert Storm' for the Amiga. But even that game had a better handling 20 years ago than Heli Heroes. The controls are bad, the camera is shaky and tends to fade out completely. The action is lackluster, the aiming isn't good and there just Isn't much to do overall. Yes, I only played the game 20 minutes, but believe me, those 20 minutes are enough to make up your mind. I won't install it again and I can't recommend buying or playing it since it's both, a waste of time and money.

This was a sad day for gaming.  I envy the people that had to work on this golden piece of crap.  There is so much wrong with this game, You can fly though moantains, missiles that should hit mis you, ''strategy'' = just hold down shift and ctrl and to top it off you have to hear the most terrible voice acting in your life with every kill you make.  If that wont stop you buying this game then you are a true Hero!  PS: Dont judge me i got this 1 for free!! :'(
